native.name: EMA
native.description: Exponential Moving Average - A type of moving average that gives more weight to recent data

native.name: PPO
native.description: Percentage Price Oscillator - Shows relationship between two moving averages

native.name: CCI
native.description: Commodity Channel Index - Momentum indicator for overbought/oversold conditions

native.name: DEMA
native.description: Double Exponential Moving Average - Fast-acting moving average

native.name: LRC
native.description: Linear Regression Channel - Plots line that best fits prices over time period

native.name: MACD
native.description: Moving Average Convergence Divergence - Trend-following momentum indicator

native.name: RSI
native.description: Relative Strength Index - Measures speed and change of price movements

native.name: SMA
native.description: Simple Moving Average - Arithmetic moving average

native.name: TSI
native.description: True Strength Index - Momentum indicator with moving averages

native.name: UO
native.description: Ultimate Oscillator - Uses weighted average of three time periods

init.description: Executed when strategy starts. Initialize indicators and state.

update.description: Runs on every new candle. Access current candle data.

log.description: Executed on new candle when debug flag is on. Used for logging.

check.description: Runs after warmup period. Main logic for buy/sell decisions.

end.description: Optional. Executed after backtest completion. Not used in live trading.

sample_strategies.name: MACD
sample_strategies.logic: Buy when MACD line crosses above signal line, sell when below

sample_strategies.name: RSI Bull and Bear
sample_strategies.description: RSI-based strategy with different thresholds for bull/bear markets
sample_strategies.logic: Different RSI thresholds based on market trend

sample_strategies.name: Bollinger Bands
sample_strategies.description: Mean reversion strategy using Bollinger Bands
sample_strategies.logic: Buy at lower band, sell at upper band

sample_strategies.name: EMA Crossover
sample_strategies.logic: Buy when fast EMA crosses above slow EMA

api_endpoints: GET /api/indicators/:name/preview - Preview indicator with sample data

ui_components: StrategyEditor - Monaco editor with Gekko syntax highlighting
BacktestResults - Equity curve and trade visualization
ChartComponent - Candlestick chart with indicator overlays
ParameterSweep - Grid search for strategy optimization
